GtkGraphTrace Struct Reference

Detailed Description

the data describing each individual trace of a graph. This is an opaque structure and its contents should not be written to directly. Instead please use the API function gtk_graph_trace_set_data(), gtk_graph_trace_format_line(), gtk_graph_trace_format_marker() and gtk_graph_trace_format_title() to modify the contents of this structure

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
  • gtkgraph.h
